author: Chicago Tribune
title: See the first photos of the new Terzo Piano, the restaurant in the Art Institute - Chicago Tribune

organizations.name: terzo piano abel uribe / chicago tribune  diners

text:
See the first photos of the new Terzo Piano, the restaurant in the Art Institute The new Terzo Piano Abel Uribe / Chicago Tribune 
A long marble bar was added to the restaurant, which sits on the third floor of the Art Institute's Modern Wing. 
A long marble bar was added to the restaurant, which sits on the third floor of the Art Institute's Modern Wing. (Abel Uribe / Chicago Tribune) The new Terzo Piano Abel Uribe / Chicago Tribune 
Diners enjoy lunch in the newly remodeled space, featuring slate gray and oak Mathilda chairs designed by Patricia Urquiola for Moroso. 
Diners enjoy lunch in the newly remodeled space, featuring slate gray and oak Mathilda chairs designed by Patricia Urquiola for Moroso. (Abel Uribe / Chicago Tribune)
